EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading The Upside-Down Economics of Building Your Own Platform <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/the-upside-down-economics-of-building-your-own-platform]]> white paper. We hope you find it informative and helpful as you explore technology options for your digital transformation journey.
Given your interest in this white paper, we thought you might also find these resources of use:
- Blog: 5 Confessions of a Platform Builder <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/5-confessions-of-a-platform-builder]]> - Blog: PCF 2.3 Helps You Deliver Superior Business Outcomes <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-blog/pcf-2-3]]> - Video: Choosing Software Abstractions <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=icZaMdNExNU]]> - Podcast: Focus on Product, Not Just Operations <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-podcasts/focus-on-product-not-just-operations-growing-customer-focused-staff-with-thomas-squeo-ep-115]]> - Video: Platform is Product <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kFUMu3SVptY]]> - White Paper: Crossing the Value Stream: Improving Development with Pivotal and Cloud Foundry <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/crossing-the-value-stream-improving-development-with-pivotal-and-cloud-foundry]]>
If you would like more information, or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization on its digital transformation journey, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
